actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-252.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 3917, a bill to amend titles XV and XVI of the Public Health Service Act to revise and extend the authorities and requirements under those titles for health planning and health resources development, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3917 (Health planning and resources development).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 3917, a bill to amend titles XV and XVI of the Public Health Service Act to revise and extend the authorities and requirements under those titles for health planning and health resources development, and for other purposes.
